plot outline: The film revolves around urban youth and depicts the problems and confusions they face in real life. Two young couples travel through moments of Love-Hate deceit and anxious encounters to finally arrive into their destinies, which is marriage by choice with the blessings of elders and friends.
title: Chaki Kahe Chaka Jo Baka
plot: The film revolves around urban youth and depicts the problems and confusions they face in real life. Two young couples travel through moments of Love-Hate deceit and anxious encounters to finally arrive into their destinies, which is marriage by choice with the blessings of elders and friends.::Utpal Modi <modiutpal@gmail.com>
